items.title: Anker’s white model 25W Qi2 MagSafe Charging station w/ onboard display is also 30% off
items.summary:
Yesterday we featured a deal on the black model Anker Prime Wireless Charging Station with the onboard display, 3-in-1 setup, onboard cooling, and the 25W Qi2 power, but what about the all-white model? This one didn’t launch at the same time as the black model and seems to be slipping under the radar to some degree so we wanted to highlight it this afternoon – it is now on sale at 30% off too.
